calculate_name = #{calculateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
calculate_type = #{calculateType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
content = json_set(content, '$.period', #{period,jdbcType=INTEGER}),
content = json_set(content, '$.times', #{times,jdbcType=INTEGER}),
content = json_set(content, '$.calculate', #{calculate,jdbcType=INTEGER}),
content = json_set(content, '$.ratio', #{ratio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}),
is_use = #{isUse,jdbcType=INTEGER},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_skip = #{isSkip,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

mapper.select: select max(calculate_code) as maxCode from calculate_config
